name: Fruit Matcher! Lite
description:
Fruit Matcher! Lite is the hypercasual free-to-play mobile game sensation that's sweeping the world by storm!

Can you match all 3 fruits? You just have to tap the button at the right time! And if you fail your first few tries, no worries! Just give it another shot!

Fruit Matcher! Lite (referenced herein as the "App") is supported by advertising and sponsorship revenue. Therefore, the App is provided, per the terms of this Agreement, without an additional fee unless you choose to purchase more "Lives". A purchase utilises the "in-app" purchase paradigm. Upon your purchase of a "Life", you will be automatically subscribed to "Fruit Matcher Monthly" (referenced herein as the "Subscription"). The subscription will renew on a periodic basis (as designated by Videogēmu Inc.) unless you indicate and request non-renewal through the App. Can someone hear me? Help. Subscription payments will be processed by Videogēmu Inc. or a participating mobile app provider, from which you originally downloaded the application. You may access the applicable "in-app" purchase rules and policies directly from the applicable app store(s). Additional terms or conditions may apply to a subscription at the time of order or renewal.

The App features gameplay that might be construed by some as gambling, and is therefore not suita̷b̶l̷e̷ for those with g̵a̷m̶b̴l̶i̸n̴g̶ ̵a̸d̷d̴i̶c̷t̵i̶o̸n̵s̸ or those who are under the age of 18.

The App accepts m̡̰̤̠̝̹̤̹͈̮͔͈̜͢ͅà̛̺̼̫͕̝̙̙̩̝̼͔͈͚̲̞̣̪̪͢ͅņ҉̛͓͈̜̲̥̠̩͓̳̱̩y̵̸̧̧̩̲̫̦̼̯͉͈̙̳̖͢ͅ ̸͉̘͔̣̞͘͡f̸̧̢͕̘̖̤͖̫o̡̭̻͙̺̩̰̣̩̜̦̕r̷̢҉̷̡͇̠͚̬̭͔͔̠̫̟͕͇̖̠ͅm̴̴̙̹̞͇̘͖̟͢͝s̙̙̘͉͖̜̜͖͓͈͖͈̝͈̙͘̕̕͘͟ͅ ҉̷̨̤͎̠̲͇͉͎̹̀ͅo̵̳͍̳̲̳̗̙͔̼̖̼͖̠͞f̜̰̖̮̝͎̠͖͔̭͓̼͓̠͎͟ ̵̢͚̲̯̻͢ ̧̢̟͖̺̤͔̬͇̻͙͍̺̱̜̮͇̲̞̥̕͠P̶̀͘͏̲̫͇̝͖͎̯̪͉̞́ͅ ̷̖̬̺̩͚̥̩̯̟͎̜̙̰͢ͅÁ̸̡̳̰̤͖͓̣̩̮͎̬͡ ̘̭͈̥̯͓̬̱̯̳̳̱̹͇̕͞ͅÝ̠̬͇̮̫̤͚̹͖͓̫̤͚̝͢͜͝͝ ͏̪̩̹͓̬͇̙̹̩̞̼̘̣̱̙͡M̧̢͉̖̫̟̬̗̹̩̲̖̫͚̪̲̭̝͚̀ͅ ̤̩̖͙̰̱͈͙̝̼̻̝̣̝̖́͝ͅE̵̬̟̠̣͎̳͕͝͠ ̴̢̕͘͏̖̞̯̼̭͍͙̦̙͓̘̦̭̭ͅN͡͏̢͇̤͔̜̳͍͇̩̱̬̖̘̞͎̪͉̦͖͙ ̴̶̛̻̜̤͙͓̬̻͈̮̦̥͘͠T̷̩͕͇̹͖̯͙̬̝̱̻̜͢͡.̴̧̛̯̦͖͖̣̺͔͓̣̪̞̩̹͇̲̕
